snippet: A teacher accused of trying to thwart an investigation into the rape of a 16-year-old girl in Steubenville will have the charge dismissed in exchange for community service, the state attorney general said Friday.
abstract: Seth Fluharty, teacher accused of trying to thwart investigation into rape of 16-year-old girl in Steubenville, Ohio, will have charge dismissed in exchange for community service at a domestic violence shelter.
lead_paragraph: A teacher accused of trying to thwart an investigation into the rape of a 16-year-old girl in Steubenville will have the charge dismissed in exchange for community service, the state attorney general said Friday.

headline.main: Ohio: Charge Against Teacher Is Resolved
